scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n shared,backend,frontend -c blue,green,magenta "npm run dev:shared" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build: npm-run-all clean:dist build:shared build:backend build:frontend sync-dist
scripts.clean:deps: rimraf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules shared/node_modules backend/package-lock.json frontend/package-lock.json shared/package-lock.json package-lock.json
